dialogue.doctor: Where on your body do you typically find these spots?
dialogue.patient: I typically find these spots on my legs and arms.

dialogue.doctor: Are there other similar spots in other parts of your body?
dialogue.patient: No, there are no other similar spots in other parts of my body.

dialogue.doctor: Can you describe the shape and size of this spot?
dialogue.patient: The spot is irregularly shaped, with a somewhat oval form, and it appears to be about the size of a small coin.

dialogue.doctor: Does the edge of this spot look clear or fuzzy?
dialogue.patient: The edge of this spot looks fuzzy.

dialogue.doctor: What color is the spot on your skin?
dialogue.patient: The spot on my skin is red.

dialogue.doctor: Is there anything unusual about the texture of this spot?
dialogue.patient: Yes, there is something unusual about the texture. It appears to be rougher and more uneven than the surrounding skin.

dialogue.doctor: Do you experience any discomfort or symptoms around this area?
dialogue.patient: No, I don't experience any discomfort or symptoms around this area.

dialogue.doctor: How often do you notice this spot?
dialogue.patient: I noticed this spot a few days ago.
